querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS AppNo,A.APP_ID AS AppId, AG.CUST_NAME AS CustName, StatDescr.DESCR AS Stat, CurrStepDescr.DESCR AS CurrStep, LastStepDescr.DESCR AS LastStep
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.AGRMNT AG WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AG.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS StatDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_STAT = StatDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND StatDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND StatDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STAT' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS CurrStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_CURR_STEP = CurrStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND CurrStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND CurrStepDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STEP' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS LastStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_LAST_STEP = LastStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND LastStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND LastStepDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STEP'
